explicit

Interface ModelSimple

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Model
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    NondetModelSimple
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CTMCSimple, CTMDPSimple, DTMCSimple, MDPSimple, STPGAbstrSimple, STPGExplicit

    public interface ModelSimple
extends Model
    Interface for simple mutable explicit-state model representations.

    • Method Detail

      • addInitialState

        void addInitialState(int i)
        Add a state to the list of initial states.

      • buildFromPrismExplicit

        void buildFromPrismExplicit(java.lang.String filename)
                     throws PrismException
        Build (anew) from a list of transitions exported explicitly by PRISM (i.e. a .tra file). Note that initial states are not configured (since this info is not in the file), so this needs to be done separately (using addInitialState(int).
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • clearState

        void clearState(int i)
        Clear all information for a state (i.e. remove all transitions).

      • addState

        int addState()
        Add a new state and return its index.

      • addStates

        void addStates(int numToAdd)
        Add multiple new states.

      • setStatesList

        void setStatesList(java.util.List<State> statesList)
        Set the associated (read-only) state list.

      • addLabel

        void addLabel(java.lang.String name,
              java.util.BitSet states)
        Adds a label and the set the states that satisfy it. Any existing label with the same name is overwritten.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the label
        states - The states that satisfy the label
